page.title: 10LEISURE CENTRE:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {The Pinewood Leisure Centre}houses a number of clubs in a group of buildings originally a sanatorium. The centre pays a peppercorn rent to Wokingham District Council which owns the lease. Clubs at present are:- {Pinewood Shooting Association {East Berks Operatic Society {Wokingham Without Community Assoc. (used for a variety of functions) {Pinewood Judo Club:Allotments Assoc. {Bracknell Railway Assoc.(indoor track) {Pinewood Miniature Railway Society (outdoor track capable of carrying passengers) {Pinewood Gym. Club {2nd Crowthorne Scouts Group {Teeners Youth Club and Boxing Club {Pinewood Football Club}(boys under 10) There is an administrative lodge with duty personnel from 10a.m.-12 noon for dealing with Parish Council matters.
